name: Ruthless Safari
description: The game's plot is straightforward and Ruthless Safari takes place in the desert where our heroine decided to take a picture of a lion on his head after the blinding flash, the furious animal rushes in pursuit of it, our task is to run and time to jump over obstacles such as cactus. Every encounter with cactus leaves our heroine without one set of clothes, and then leads to death. How long you will be able to avoid a terrible fate, depends on You!
